comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_G._Gerry she was Mathilde Townsend. She later married B. Sumner Welles. See www.cosmosclub.org/Default.aspx?pageid=75&pageindex=1 A portrait of her by John Singer Sargent is in the (US) National Gallery: jssgallery.org/Paintings/Miss_Mathilde_Townsend.htm

comment.author: 23103743@N05
23103743@N05
comment._content: I have not been able to locate this painting, but I did run into a "tour" of the house she lived in in Washington, built by her mother, later lived in by Mathilde and Welles, and now the Cosmos Club. See architectdesign.blogspot.com/2011/09/townsend-mansion.html

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Salt Lake tribune., May 08, 1910, Page 14 shows this painting alongside an article about her planned June wedding. chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045396/1910-05-08/ed-... But the artist is not identified.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for the more complete story on her.  We'll include her full name next time we update.
